Nerangs.ab: mazdā at̰ mōi ... haiϑiiə̄m dā̊ ahūm čahār bār guftan pad harw čahār bār hōm ud urwarām hamē abāyēd kōftan ud hāwan škāftan
"They should recite mazdā at̰ mōi ... haiϑiiə̄m dā̊ ahūm four times. During each of the four times, he must strike the hōm and urwarām and hit the hāwan."
mazdā at̰ mōi ... haiϑiiə̄m dā̊ ahūm čahār bār guftan pad harw čahār bār hōm ud urwarām hamē abāyēd kōftan
"They should recite mazdā at̰ mōi ... haiϑiiə̄m dā̊ ahūm four times. During each of the four times, he must strike continiously the hōm and urwarām."
mazdā at̰ mōi tā sar čahār bār guftan hōm ud urwarām kōftan hāwan škāftan ka ō(h) škāfēd ān ī xwēš barsom ud zōt ā-š ēdōn kunišn kū abar harw sē ōh rasēd ō hōm ud urwarām ēk

"They should recite mazdā at̰ mōi until the end four times. He should strike the hōm and urwarām and hit the hāwan. When he strikes his own barsom and the zōt has to strike the fire, he has to do it so that he reaches all the three, including hōm and urwarām (that count as) one."
